_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Paper
author: Sytex@duck.com
description: Paper is a Minecraft game server, designed to greatly improve performance, offer more advanced features & API.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

VER_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper | jq -r --arg VERSION $MINECRAFT_VERSION '.versions[] | contains($VERSION)' | grep -m1 true`
LATEST_VERSION=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper | jq -r '.versions' | jq -r '.[-1]'`

if [ "${VER_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
	echo -e "Version is valid. Using version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
else
	echo -e "Specified version not found. Defaulting to the latest paper version"
	MINECRAFT_VERSION=${LATEST_VERSION}
fi

BUILD_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r --arg BUILD ${BUILD_NUMBER} '.builds[] | tostring | contains($BUILD)' | grep -m1 true`
LATEST_BUILD=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds' | jq -r '.[-1]'`

if [ "${BUILD_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
	echo -e "Build is valid for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}. Using build ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
else
	echo -e "Using the latest paper build for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
	BUILD_NUMBER=${LATEST_BUILD}
fi

JAR_NAME=paper-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar

echo "Version being downloaded"
echo -e "MC Version: ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
echo -e "Build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
echo -e "JAR Name of Build: ${JAR_NAME}"
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/paper/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}

cd /mnt/server

echo -e "Running curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

if [ -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
	mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old
fi

curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

# Downloading Pterodactyl's server-icon.png

if [ -f server-icon.png ]; then 
     mv server-icon.png server-icon.png.old
fi

curl -o server-icon.png https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SytexMC/configuration-files/main/1.19.4/server-icon.png

if [ ${OPTIMIZED_CONFIGS} == "enabled" ];then
    
    # Downloading Mojang's server.properties

    if [ -f server.properties ]; then 
        mv server.properties server.properties.old
    fi

    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SytexMC/configuration-files/main/1.19.4/server.properties

    # Downloading Bukkit's bukkit.yml

    if [ -f bukkit.yml ]; then 
        mv bukkit.yml bukkit.yml.old
    fi

    curl -o bukkit.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SytexMC/configuration-files/main/1.19.4/bukkit.yml

    # Downloading Spigot's spigot.yml

    if [ -f spigot.yml ]; then 
        mv spigot.yml spigot.yml.old
    fi

    curl -o spigot.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SytexMC/configuration-files/main/1.19.4/spigot.yml

    # Downloading Paper's paper-global.yml

    if [ -f config/paper-global.yml ]; then 
        mv config/paper-global.yml config/paper-global.yml.old
    fi

    curl --create-dirs -o config/paper-global.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SytexMC/configuration-files/main/1.19.4/config/paper-global.yml 

    # Downloading Paper's paper-world-defaults.yml

    if [ -f config/paper-world-defaults.yml ]; then 
        mv config/paper-world-defaults.yml config/paper-world-defaults.yml.old
    fi
 
    curl --create-dirs -o config/paper-world-defaults.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SytexMC/configuration-files/main/1.19.4/config/paper-world-defaults.yml  
fi

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description: Select the Minecraft version you wish to install. To stay up-to-date, keep the setting on 'latest'. If you select an invalid version, it will automatically switch to the latest version.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description: Build number for the Paper release. Set to 'latest' to ensure you always receive the most up-to-date version. Please note that any invalid versions will automatically default to the latest build.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server JAR file used to run or during re/installation of the server.

variables.name: Automatic Updating
variables.description: If enabled, the server will automatically update to the latest build of the current version. Make sure the server jar file is named 'server.jar' & do not use this with modded versions.

variables.name: JVM Startup Flags
variables.description: This allows you to fully customize your JVM startup flags, with Aikar's flags set as the default option.

variables.name: Optimized Configs
variables.description: If enabled, the server will automatically download optimized configurations during re/installation.
